How to execute the build.xml

= Introduction =

This guide demonstrates how to execute the build.xml from Eclipse.


= Details =

 # Open the build.xml into an eclipse editor.

 # Locate the outline view. (Upper right in Java perspective, lower left in resource perspective). Perspectives can be changed by selecting Window/Open Perspective. (See reply 28 for a visual).

 # Right click in the "Outline View" the line saying "deploy_mod" or optionally an individual task you wish to execute.

 # Select Run As/Ant Build.
